resources.string: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
Please insert your baby\'s name and birth.

string-array.name: growth_array
string-array.item: "Recognizes mother's voice. Watches toys in motion. Active limbs."
"Smiles at mom's face. Stretches arms and legs. Lifts chest while lying down. Starts babbling."
"Clears throat. Responds to sounds and smells. Blinks eyes. Sucks fingers. Waves arms and kicks."
"Hair becomes stronger. Reaches for moving objects. Responds to colorful toys. Senses mom's emotional changes. Emotional expressions become richer."
"Hair falls out. Neck movement increases. Shows interest in objects as eyesight develops. Puts everything in mouth. Can rock body and flip over."
"Teething begins. Rolls over. Sits, extends arms, and pulls back. Attempts to hold toys with both hands."
"Bites fingers while teething. Memory develops, exploring hidden objects and imitating mom. Sits alone. Be cautious of cavities and mouth shape."
"Self-feeds. Transfers objects from hand to hand. Shows separation anxiety, needs mom's love. Check motor development."
"Starts repeating consonants. Responds to name. Grasps objects with thumb and forefinger. Finds toys under objects. Check excretion cycle and stool."
"Crawls and stands. Curious, gets angry when toys taken. Imitates actions. Takes steps holding mom's hand. Assertive, prone to crying and tantrums."
"Stands up alone. Walks holding hands. Grasps small objects. Explores with hands. Holds cup, drinks. People recognize familiar faces. Adjusts baby food for digestion."
"Distinguishes praise from scolding. Interested in colorful pictures. Plays simple ball games. Adjusts posture when dressing."
